document_data.name: Rosemary
document_data.mainbody: '''Rosemary''' was a type of plant in the Realms that was primarily used as either a [[spices|spice]] or a [[herb]].
document_data.Availability:
* In addition to selling pure rosemary,
* Rosemary could be purchased in the markets of [[Waterdeep]].

Notable Users of Rosemary.Magic: * A sprig of rosemary could be used as a [[material component]] in the [[spell]] ''[[banishment]]''.{{Cite dragon/68/From the Sorcerer's Scroll|55}}
Notable Users of Rosemary.Races: * Rosemary was one of many spices that [[human]]s would often make into a powder and mix with other spices, then use to paint some meat.
Notable Users of Rosemary.Regions & Settlements:
* Rosemary was one of the herbs that the restaurant [[Infernal Rapture]] typically used to season deep fried, [[miniature giant space hamster]]s.
* In the lands further south and east of the [[Western Heartlands]], rosemary was among the spices considered "base staples" and were often found being carried in the spice pouches of travelers.<ref>{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-07-13 - Spices When Traveling}}

document_data.Usage: Rosemary was a common ingredient, alongside [[onion]]s and [[thyme]], used to season a full leg of [[sheep|mutton]], be it roasted, smoked, or simply stewed.
